name: Rounded Rocky Walls 2
description:
Rounded Rocky Walls 2 is an action rhythm game where you have to avoid obstacles that appear with the music.

Make sure to follow me on twitter: @ScrollingBird

You may have noticed that the game is the second version of an older game. This is because I needed a simple game to make to be sure to learn how to use Godot more than how to make a game. I don't know if it makes sense, but I get what I wanted. I'm now ready to make the "bigger game" I mentioned in the little webcomic. I really want to do a real game for once.

Musics:

  • Level 1: Sylvain Adas
  • Approximative dash: Nathan Bottet
  • Titlescreen, Spooky beat, Stressed bits and Grand finale: Mathieu Casubolo
